tool_description: API to detect emotion, sentiment from text.
name: CrystalFeel API
title: CrystalFeel API

api_list.name: crystal_lace
api_list.description: Sarcasm Detect Score - Unravel the complexity of humor, enrich conversations, and make sense of social interactions like never before!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crystalfeel-api.p.rapidapi.com/crystal_lace"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crystalfeel-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
